database

Class DatabaseStuff

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DatabaseStuff

  • public class DatabaseStuff
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to connect to the hangman database and perform a set of fixed operations on this database. These operations are then used by the hangman Web Service to provide functionality to allow you to create and play the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseStuff()
      The constructor for the class.

      java.lang.String getRandomWord()
      This method is used to generate a random word for a new game from the list stored on the database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseStuff

        public DatabaseStuff()
        The constructor for the class. This connects to a copy of the database on your local machine and initializes the connection and statement objects.

    • Method Detail

      • checkLogin

        public int checkLogin(java.lang.String user,
                      java.lang.String pass)
        This method is used to check login credentials against the database and returns the unique user id the supplied details if correct.
        Parameters:
        user - the username you use to login - this is a string.
        pass - the password you use to login - this is a string.
        Returns:
        either:
        • the unique user id of the logged in user (this will be an integer greater than 0).
        • 0 (if no user with the credentials can be found.
        • -2 if there is a problem connecting to the DB or DBMS.
        • -1 if there is a general failure for other reasons.

      • getUsername

        public java.lang.String getUsername(int id)
        This method is used to get the username for a supplied user id.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique user id that you wish to find a name for
        Returns:
        either:
        • the username of the user id you supplied
        • "EXCEPTION_ERROR" if there is a failure for any reason.

      • register

        public int register(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String surname,
                    java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password,
                    java.lang.String email)
        This method is used to create a new user on the database.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new user - this is a string.
        surname - the surname of the new user - this is a string.
        username - the username of the new user - this is a string.
        password - the password of the new user - this is a string.
        email - the email address of the new user - this is a string.
        Returns:
        either:
        • the unique user id of the new user (this will be an integer greater than 0).
        • 0 if the details could not be entered on the DB for some reason.
        • -1 if there is a general failure.

      • getWordFromGame

        public java.lang.String getWordFromGame(int gid)
        This method returns the word for a particular game indicated by the game id supplied.
        Parameters:
        gid - the unique id of a game on the system.
        Returns:
        either:
        • "EXCEPTION_ERROR" if there is some general failure.
        • the word for the game you indicated.

      • getRandomWord

        public java.lang.String getRandomWord()
        This method is used to generate a random word for a new game from the list stored on the database.
        Returns:
        either:
        • "EXCEPTION_ERROR" if there is some general failure.
        • the random word

      • addNewGame

        public int addNewGame(int p)
        This method creates a new game listing on the database for a supplied user id.
        Parameters:
        p - the user id of the player of the new game
        Returns:
        either:
        • the unique game id of the new game.
        • -1 if the game could not be created on the database for some reason.

      • guess

        public void guess(java.lang.String l,
                  int gid,
                  int pid,
                  int correct)
        This method is used to indicate a user's guess of a letter in the game
        Parameters:
        l - the letter the user is guessing is in the word.
        gid - the unique id of the game they are playing.
        pid - the players unique user id.
        correct - a value indicating if the guess is correct or not. This method returns no values.

      • resign

        public void resign(int p,
                   int g)
        This method is used to resign a particular game.
        Parameters:
        p - the unique user id of the player.
        g - the unique game id of the game. This method returns no values.

      • guessesUsed

        public int guessesUsed(int g)
        This method is used to see how many incorrect guesses the user has made.
        Parameters:
        g - the unique game id of the game we are checking.
        Returns:
        either:
        • the number of incorrect guesses the user has made.
        • -1 if there is a general failure.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        This method is used to close the connection to the DB and DBMS.
